text: The 2017 European Fencing Championships were held in Tbilisi, Georgia from 12 to 17 June 2017 at the Tbilisi Gymnastic Arena. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%;" |- |bgcolor=#00cc33| ● ||Opening Ceremony|| bgcolor=#ffcc00| ● ||Finals||bgcolor=#ee3333| ● ||Closing Ceremony |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%; line-height:1.25em;" |- ! colspan="2" | June !! 12 !! 13 !! 14 !! 15 !! 16 !! 17 !!
